title: Node.js & npm
description: Node.js version 16 or higher with npm package manager installed on your system. This is required to install and run AutoTester dependencies.

title: API Access
description: Valid API credentials for your testing environment. You'll need authentication tokens or API keys to connect AutoTester to your services.

title: Project Setup
description: An existing project with test scenarios ready for automation. AutoTester works best with well-structured test cases and clear requirements.
